name: Golden Rails: Valuable Package
description:
Join Jack and Jill on an exciting new adventure in the world of postal deliveries! After being chased by bandits and losing some valuable packages, Philip turns to his new friends for help in delivering all the remaining packages to their rightful owners. But it's not just a simple delivery task - the bandits are still on the loose and willing to do whatever it takes to get their hands on the rare and valuable packages.




As you progress through the game, help the trio distribute packages from the warehouse and make sure they don't fall into the wrong hands. Work with the sheriff to catch Little Zapp and his gang, who have been terrorizing postal stagecoaches across the country. Keep your eyes peeled for rare and valuable packages, like a monument to the city's founder, a new courthouse clock, and more!



With 45 different levels and 5 fast-paced minigame levels in the base game, as well as 15 more exciting levels and another minigame level in the Collector’s Edition, you'll have to be quick and efficient to make sure every package reaches its addressee.



With your help, Philip, Jack, and Jill can make people happy by delivering their long-awaited packages on time. Experience the joy of delivering happiness to people's doorsteps today!
